timeline.title: Certificate Process
timeline.description: Each certificate represents a real process that takes more than a year and requires daily effort. This is how it happens:

step_1.title: Seed Selection
step_1.description: The best seeds of native trees are selected, chosen for their value in honey production and traditional Maya housing.

step_2.title: Nursery Care
step_2.subtitle: 10 months
step_2.description: Trees are watered daily, cared for, moved, bagged, and transported when ready.

step_3.title: Transport and Planting
step_3.description: When the rains arrive, the trees are carried to reforestation zones—rugged terrain with challenging conditions.

step_4.title: Monitoring and Replacement
step_4.subtitle: 12 months
step_4.description: Each tree is monitored to ensure it survives. If it doesn’t, it is replanted.

difference.question: What’s the difference between donating and buying a certificate?
difference.answer: Donating is a free contribution, with no need to register or receive anything in return. On the other hand, buying a certificate means you acquire a digital document representing a real planted tree, with tracking and personalization options.

cost.question: How much does a certificate cost?
cost.answer: Each certificate costs $350 MXN, which covers the full process from seed selection to over a year of tree monitoring.

what_receive.question: What do I receive when I buy a certificate?
what_receive.answer: You’ll receive a personalized digital certificate that includes all your tree’s information and tracking options.

tree_types.question: What types of trees are planted?
tree_types.answer: We plant endemic species that are useful to the Maya community, carefully selected to support biodiversity, honey production, and traditional construction.

money_destination.question: Where does my money go?
money_destination.answer: Your contribution is used transparently across the entire reforestation and community development process.
details: Fair payment to the community caring for them

multiple_certificates.question: Can I buy more than one certificate at a time?
multiple_certificates.answer: Yes, you can purchase as many certificates as you want in a single transaction. You’ll receive an individual certificate for each tree acquired.

tree_tracking.question: Can I track my tree?
tree_tracking.answer: Yes. When you buy a certificate, you can request personalized tracking that includes periodic photos, health status, and progress updates.

donation_registration.question: Do I need to register to donate?
donation_registration.answer: No. Free donations don’t require registration or login. Just choose the amount and that’s it.

purchase_registration.question: And to buy a certificate?
purchase_registration.answer: Yes. Buying certificates requires creating an account or logging in, since a purchase history is generated and certificates are assigned to you.

gift_certificate.question: Can I give a certificate as a gift?
gift_certificate.answer: Yes. You can buy a certificate and enter the name of the person you want to give it to. Soon you'll be able to include a personalized message.

certificate_delivery_time.question: Will I receive the certificate immediately?
certificate_delivery_time.answer: You’ll receive your digital certificate as soon as your payment is processed. In some cases, it might take a few minutes.

physical_certificate.question: Can I get a physical certificate?
physical_certificate.answer: For now, we only issue digital certificates. We’re working on offering an optional physical version in the future.
